data.title: Japanese Restaurant
data.meta_description: Japanese cuisine. Sushi. Teppan dinners. Teriyaki. Call for takeout and curbside options!
data.text:
As a local, family-owned and operated bar and restaurant, Spider Sushi Bar has been providing amazing sushi rolls and teriyaki cuisine in Rockford, IL since 2008 Miguel Rubi is the owner & Chef with over 30 years experience. You can also come to us for freshly made dinner options and Japanese noodle dishes. We offer a gluten-free menu. Dine-in, takeout, and curbside pickup are available for your convenience. Contact us today to learn more or to place an order!

You'll find a wide range of menu options at Spider Sushi Bar! From mouth-watering appetizers to sizzling teppan dinners, there's something for everyone on our menu.

No matter what you order, you'll find the perfect beverage on our menu to complement your meal. We offer soft drinks, cocktails, beer, and wine.
